website_summaries.verdict: This 4-horn system comes with a complete installation kit to get you up and running in no time.
pros: 4 horns in descending sizes for different tones
cons: for compressor tank to refill with air

customer_reviews.title: Super loud
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install , super loud for the size. I thought about returning them when I saw them. Sounds like a train thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jose B

customer_reviews.title: Pump failed after a few months
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE: compressor did not last 4 months!** nice and loud comes with everything you need. The only drawback is the horns to leak at the control valve wish there's nothing you can do about that. The air leak is very small and is where the solenoid opens and closes. The air pump lines and tank do not leak and they are great workmanship. It is frustrating because the pump runs constantly to build the pressure that is being lost
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap isn't good and good isn't cheap...
customer_reviews.text: You buy cheap, you buy twice!! After a very short time with these horns I have experienced numerous failures. Defective air tank drain valve, air compressor self destructing (rubber mounts disintegrating/Allen bolts for compressor head walking themselves out) and finally a complete failure of the compressor. The money you might save buying these cheap Chinese horns will be spent eventually and then some on quality horns.
customer_reviews.author: J.Bunz

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, I received a LEMON
customer_reviews.text: My experience was awful, I wrote the company to advise them that my horn was not working. it was 3 days after paying for having it installed only half of the horn is working and when the horn is honked it's letting out a loud screech. I was told to send it back which I would have to pay for. They would have the mechanics check it and if they found it faulty they would send me a new one. That would mean that I would have to pay my mechanic to remove and go with out a horn. There are no stars for this issue but I had to give it a 1 just to post this review
customer_reviews.author: Pohainani

customer_reviews.title: BUY LONGER HOSE IF ITS A TRUCK BUY YOURE OWN POWER WIRE. 10G STRANDED. OR ELSE YOU WILL HAVE A FIRE.
customer_reviews.text: out of the box, it looked great. everything was there. there wasnt enough air tubing (2005 f250 supercrew) to install my air tank and horns from the back of the truck to the front. had to upgrade to 3/8 hose. I installed everything and to my suprise.... the motor slows down... and thump thump thump... every half a second it makes a full revolution. will not fill up to 200psi. only hits 145 before it starts making the motor work REALLY hard to pump the air. oh did I mention there is no power wire either?
customer_reviews.author: star girl

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this Train horn set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this Train horn set , way better from others that I have purchased and returned , very loud horn , big air tank and powerful compresor , I also use this air tank with an air line just in case I ever need to air up my tires
customer_reviews.author: carlos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: All you wanted and then some
customer_reviews.text: Driving in South Florida posses numerous challenges. Purchased horns to stand out from the crowd line of people already honking and to draw attention. Mounted tank under front of my truck so it's not only hidden but protected. Trumpets mounted behind the grill gave similar advantages while having plenty of room for other accessories. These do the job and do it well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Weinrich

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: The supplied air line and valve for the horn are WAY TOO SMALL. It appeared to be about 1/8” and I upgraded both to 3/8” and the sound is on a whole different level. It was starved for volume. Also the pump broke after about four months Of use and had to buy another one. They have a one year warranty but I had purchased it while I was in Afghanistan and they didn’t care it had only been used for a short time, just went off the purchase date.
customer_reviews.author: BETZPHOTO

customer_reviews.title: Good starting point for on board air
customer_reviews.text: The kit supposably comes with everything needed to install. Coming from experience with wiring I would say yes it has everything to make it work but not wire it in the correct way in which I would like. Other than that the horns are higher pitched than a train horn still very loud but as good as you're going to get for 300 bucks. I would recommend this kit as a good starting point or a way to get on board air If you want a real train horn sound you're going to have to buy a real train horn and those ain't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Seriously loud.
customer_reviews.text: You. Will. Not. Be. Disappointed..... had to grab a relay and an additional inline fuses. Changed the fittings to run 3/8 o.d. tube. Cut the stock horn wires to and hook it up. Loudest alarm in the whole neighborhood. 😂 This 200 psi system is far louder than my buddys 150 psi system. Oh yeah, if you cut and hook it to the stock horn harness remember it honks when you double tap the lock button on your ket fob. 🤦‍♂️ oops 😂.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Vixen train horn kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit and installed it to my 24ft box truck as an auxiliary horn. Regular horn for regular traffic and vixen train horn for the retards on the street. It's very loud and actually sounds like a train is passing by when I'm driving and I honk it. The installation was a bit time consuming and there were some materials that was needed that wasn't sufficiently provided like pos and neg wire. All in all, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Best deal arround and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Yes i bought this probpduct to install on my truck it came very well packaged and seal proerly very easy to install and operrate i also installed a quick connector so i can air up my tires this 3 gallon airtank it it a very nice and affordable
customer_reviews.author: moises villasenor

customer_reviews.title: Super loud
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them. Probably going to regret it here soon due to him scaring me honking his horn everytime I come near his truck. Super loud for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Headrick

customer_reviews.title: Compressor went out after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Compressor went out after 6 months. It had a leak the entire time, which was annoying because the compressor would just start randomly running... which I guess is a reason the compressor doesn’t work anymore. For the price they should last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Super loud
customer_reviews.text: Had a mechanic install. Use this tank system for airlift bags and extra compressor air, in addition to the horns. Good value. Horns are very loud. Not super deep though. More of a mid high range sound
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with anything to install
customer_reviews.text: I like the horn sound, very loud. Installation is long, difficult and expensive. Bought $145.00 worth of wire, fittings etc. Had to have a friend help me. Materials and labor double the cost of the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Should have known better
customer_reviews.text: Compressor stopped building air in the tank past 10 psi, there isn’t a leak, check valve is fine. Of course the return window has just closed and the 786 number provided goes to a voicemail. I doubt I’ll be receiving a call back.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Nice horns
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a train horn but still loud. These horns are the best for the price. They are loud as crap. The only thing I did differently was get rid of the cheap horn button included in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA HYKES

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Works great . The compressor stopped working after just over a year and was no longer under warranty. Called their customer service and got a great deal on a new even better compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Dilbeer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great amazing pump didn't wanna kick on but it was just a connection to the regulator that tells it when to kick on fixed it with better ones has been working great for over a year now
customer_reviews.author: Shade Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Decent, needs more materials provided
customer_reviews.text: Ok product. Mounted under the truck, and wasnt all too happy with the horn. Air tank and compressor are great. They did not provided enough wiring or hose to plumb and wire the compressor and horn.
customer_reviews.author: Zack DeBruin

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This product is unreliable. In less then a month after installing the horns no longer work. That seems unacceptable in my opinion. I had to give at least 1 star but not worth it at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my horn!
customer_reviews.text: this was exactly what i was looking for! perfect sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Glass

customer_reviews.title: Horny horns
customer_reviews.text: I put in a horn’s 8 horns now I’m super horny
customer_reviews.author: james ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Super Loud, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Super crazy loud, excellent made, would highly recommend this horn.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: This item is just trash
customer_reviews.text: this item is worthless it work for a month and now stopped working I trying to contact the seller and I didn't get any response
customer_reviews.author: gonzalolopez316@gmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it its loud and but the air tank is too big will not fit underneath the 4door jeep wrangler so I had to create a setup inside
customer_reviews.author: Williamdonato

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very loud somewhat sounds like a train but enough to scare people with as jokes
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great! But, with one downside
customer_reviews.text: Loved the horn and air compressor but not everything comes with the kit for it to even turn on. You need wiring and air hose for it to even turn on. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jordan s.

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a month and compressor broke only used ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a month and compressor broke only used it a few times and instead of replacing the compressor they want me to return everything wait for a credit and the buy it again I won't but this one again what a Hassel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i dont know whats wrong but it doesnt sound that ...
customer_reviews.text: i dont know whats wrong but it doesnt sound that loud... i had experience with truck horns 150psi that sounds tuffer !!! Sounds like a wistle... maybe a problem with the horns
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Altho I'm not very pleased with the noise. I had it professionally installed and had the hose no longer than 8 inches from the tank and it's still no louder then my stock horn.
customer_reviews.author: TONY THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: My horn is already not working seams to me the air compressor is bad
customer_reviews.author: Allan lukasz

customer_reviews.title: Very easy installation
customer_reviews.text: this horn kit is all you need nice and loud and easy to install great item.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY

customer_reviews.title: Difficult install
customer_reviews.text: This product was very hard to install. It doesn’t come with any wiring and the switch that comes with it is abolsulte crap. Once I got it together it worked great. Install was very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Chris DeKrey

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased at all..
customer_reviews.text: The horns sound like a cartoon car, too squeaky very high pitch tone... not impressed it sounds like a $20 air horn you can buy at any auto store just louder!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was loud and amazing. I got a second horn for the system and I was truly louder then a train
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Crap, had them on my truck for less than a year and they’re already rotting through.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Loud, cool
customer_reviews.text: Loud. Hardest thing about installing it is finding a good place to mount everything
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mears

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The compressor only had about 3 hours total of run time and is shot. Would not recommend buying. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: James Mordell

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly for about 3 months and now 2 of the 4 horns stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Order extra airline trust me
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a 2018 Toyota tundra SR5 Lotta fun very loud
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Product is not working and compressor failed and shorted out. needs louder horns.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Sounds perfect when u just bump it a couple times
customer_reviews.text: Kinda of higher pitched but LOUD. Sounds perfect when u just bump it a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Leisch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Horn's compressor lasted month replaced compressor 2 compressor lasted month and half
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Their hight piched
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars bc their good horns the compressor is fairley quite and build up quickly but just wasent what I expected they were loud but hight pitched but they are quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would've rated 4/5 but... Works as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Would've rated 4/5 but... Works as I expected although the pressure control switch should be a 120-150 instead of 170-200 since the hose that feeds the horn pops at high pressure. Also had an issue with the compressor and dealer replaced the part within a day without issue. Very please with the overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only Compressor we gonna returns and exchange or replace Compressor please..Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Novy Sumarauw

product_meta.title: Vixen Horns Train Horn Kit for Trucks/Car/Semi. Complete Onboard System- 200psi Air Compressor, 3 Gallon Tank, 4 Trumpets. Super Loud dB. Fits Vehicles Like Pickup/Jeep/RV/SUV 12v VXO8330/4124B
feature_bullets: Immensely loud Quad Trumpet Train Air Horn

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
